definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to entrap/to frame/to plant false evidence against sb
to carry on one's ancestral line
in a way that justifies the use of the term/genuine/proper/in a way that conforms to logic/justifiable/appropriate/perfectly legitimate
to sound out the difficulties and retreat to avoid defeat (idiom); fig. to back out of an awkward situation/to get out on finding out what it's really like
to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom)/to denounce by word and pen
lit. chasing the wind and clutching at shadows (idiom); fig. groundless accusations/to act on hearsay evidence
stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
not to hear, not to question (idiom)/to show no interest in sth/uncritical/not in the least concerned
